info.title: Loan Contract Prolongation Request
info.description:
A request to extend one or multiple time-limited parts of the contractual relationship between the lender party and the borrower party. Loan contract prolongation involves one or multiple of the following: extension of the term; new term agreement(s); new incoming payment agreement(s) of a loan contract. A new term agreement will involve new interest, charge, settlement and waiver conditions. A new Incoming payment agreement involves changes in the payment period and corresponding payment conditions.

Loan contract prolongation also typically involves adjustment of conditions themselves (interest, charges and so on), in addition to the periods.

Note:
The entity data model for loan contract prolongation request contains a subset of the attributes of the business object of loan contract prolongation request.

Remark:
The service Loan Contract Prolongation Request is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

Use:
Loan Contract Prolongation Request can be used to display details of a prolongation (rollover/renewal) of a loan contract.

x-sap-shortText: Query and read prolongation requests for loan contracts using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: Is a request to query Loan Contract Prolongation Requests

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

Required filter properties:
- LoanContract/UUID

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
A UUID is a  universal unique identifier of a LoanContractProlongationRequest.  
GDT: NOSC_UUID

ID.title: Is an identifier for  loan contract prolongation incoming payment agreement.

Period.title: Is the period in which the IncomingPaymentAgreement is valid.

PlannedFinalPaymentAmount.title: The amount of the final payment that is planned for the incoming payment agreement.
PlannedFinalPaymentAmount.description:
Use: The planned final payment for a loan is a payment agreed with the account holder. It is due as the last payment of the loan. 
GDT: Amount

LastPaymentDatePeriodEndAdjustmentIndica.title: Indicates whether the last payment date in the payment plan must be adjusted to the end date of the period of the incoming payment agreement or not.

com.sap.gateway.default.loancontractprol.title: IncomingPaymentAgreement
com.sap.gateway.default.loancontractprol.description: An Incoming Payment Agreement is an agreement that specifies the term for incoming payments for the prolongation of the loan contract.

UUID.title: A UUID is a  universal unique identifier of a LoanContractProlongationRequest.

ID.title: ID is an identifier of the LoanContractProlongationRequest.
ID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Remark: Either 'ID' or 'LoanContractUUID' is a required filter criteria.
GDT: LoanContractProlongationRequestID

LoanContract.title: The loan contract for which a loan contract prolongation request is made.
LoanContract.description: Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Remark: Either 'ID' or 'LoanContractUUID' is a required filter criteria.

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.
BusinessProcessChainAssignment.description:
Default: If BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode is not specfiied, code value "200007 - Loan Contract Renewal (Rollover/Prolongation)" will be used by default.
BOCT: BusProcChnAssgmtFSElmnts

ChangeStateID.title: Identifies a change state of a Loan Contract Prolongation Request.

LifeCycleStatusCode.title: A LifeCycleStatusCode is the coded representation of the life cycle status of a LoanContractProlongationRequest.
LifeCycleStatusCode.description:
The values for the GDT LoanContractProlongationRequestLifeCycleStatusCode are:
1 - In Preparation 
2 - Discarded 
3 - Active 
4 - Deactivated 
5 - Completed 
6 - Cancelled 
7 - In Release for Activation 
8 - In Release for Reactivatoin  
9 - In Release for Deactivation 
10 - In Release for Cancellation
Filter: 
Only 'Eq' & 'Or' is supported as logical operator. 
Default: If LifeCycleStatusCode is not specified as a filter criteria, then code value "3 - Active" will be used by default.
GDT: LoanContractProlongationRequestLifeCycleStatusCode_V1

CancellationReasonCode.title: A CancellationReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the cancellation of a Loan Contract Prolongation Request.
CancellationReasonCode.description:
Default: If not specified, the default reason code maintained in bank account contract production control will be used. If there is no default reason code maintained in bank account contract production control then loan contract prolongation request will be canceled without any reason.Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator.
GDT: LoanContractProlongationRequestCancellationReasonCode

PenaltyRelevanceIndicator.title: Indicates whether the penalty for the Loan Contract Prolongation Request is relevant or not.

ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator.title: Indicates whether a charge for activation of Loan Contract Prolongation Request is requested to be waived or not.

LoanContractProlongationTermValidityEndD.title: Is the end date of validity of term after prolongation of the loan contract.

EarlyRepaymentCompensationAmount.title: Is the amount of early repayment compensation.
EarlyRepaymentCompensationAmount.description: Remark: Is applicable only when loan contract is prolonged before the current term agreement end date.GDT: Amount

ReimbursementAmount.title: Is the amount of reimbursement.
ReimbursementAmount.description: Remark: Is applicable only when loan contract is prolonged before the current term agreement end date.Reimbursement amount includes discount and premium amount to be reimbursed to the customer. The reimbursment is done by posting a debit/credit payment.Default: If not specified, the default reason code maintained in bank account contract production control will be used.GDT: Amount

LoanContractPaymentPlanPlannedBalanceAmo.title: Is the planned balance of payments remaining in the payment plan of the  loan contract at the time of the LoanContractProlongationRequest.

LoanContractPaymentPlanActualBalanceAmou.title: Is the actual balance of payments remaining in the payment plan of the  loan contract at the time of the LoanContractProlongationRequest.

FinalPaymentAmount.title: Is the final installment amount(Balloon)  for a loan contract after this loan contract prolongation request.

FinalPaymentDate.title: Is the due date for FinalPaymentAmount after this loan contract prolongation request.

StartDate.title: Is the start date of the validity period.
StartDate.description:
Constraint for Create/Update: 
If StartDate and EndDate are provided no Duration must be provided.
GDT:Date

Duration.title: The duration of the period.
Duration.description:
Constraint for Create/Update: 
If duration is provided StartDate must be provided and EndDate must not be provided.
GDT:Duration

EndDate.title: The EndDate is the end date of period.

com.sap.gateway.default.loancontractprol.title: UPPEROPEN_DatePeriod
com.sap.gateway.default.loancontractprol.description:
DatePeriod is a period that is defined by two points in time. These points in time are expressed in calendar days.
Remark:UPPEROPEN_DatePeriod includes the start time-point, but excludes the end time-point.
